roleset.name: cover heavily
roleset.note: BLANKET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blanket' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from blanket.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args necessary
example.text: The number of people who said they were more likely to shop at Sears fell in September to 37% from 66% in March, when Sears blanketed the airwaves with ads about its new pricing strategy.
example.arg: with ads about its new pricing strategy

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: (John saw that) Heavy snow blanketed the ground.
